title: Learning Path: Lumen artifacts
ai_summary: The user is experiencing visual artifacts related to Lumen, Unreal Engine 5's global illumination and reflection system.
ai_what_you_learn: Increase Lumen Scene Lighting Quality in Project Settings (Edit -> Project Settings -> Rendering -> Global Illumination) to 'High' or 'Epic'.
Adjust 'Final Gather Quality' in the Post Process Volume to improve the smoothness of indirect lighting. A value between 1 and 2 is a good starting point.
Experiment with 'Surface Cache' settings in the Project Settings.  Enabling it can improve quality, but it increases memory usage.
Ensure your scene's emissive materials are not excessively bright, as this can amplify Lumen artifacts. Reduce emissive strength or use indirect lighting intensity to control contribution.
